home.welcomeSubtitle: Improving healthcare in Tanzania through transparency and community feedback.

findFacilities.title: Find Healthcare Facilities
findFacilities.description: Browse and search for healthcare facilities across Tanzania.

aboutPlatform.title: About the Platform
aboutPlatform.description: Learn how MediTanzania is improving healthcare access and quality.

facilitiesMap.title: Healthcare Facilities Map
facilitiesMap.description: Explore healthcare facilities across Tanzania. Click on markers to see details.

recentUpdates.title: Recent Updates
recentUpdates.description: Stay informed about the latest improvements in healthcare facilities.

update1.title: New Survey System Launched
update1.description: We've improved our survey system to make it easier for citizens to provide feedback on their healthcare experiences.

update2.title: 10 New Facilities Added
update2.description: MediTanzania now tracks 10 additional healthcare facilities in the Dodoma region.

update3.title: Facility Improvement Program
update3.description: The Ministry of Health has launched a new program to improve facilities based on citizen feedback.

successStories.title: Success Stories
successStories.description: Read how community feedback has helped improve healthcare services.

story1.content: After multiple reports about long waiting times, our local clinic implemented a new appointment system. Now I can see a doctor within 30 minutes of arrival!
story1.author: Maria Joseph

story2.content: Thanks to feedback collected through MediTanzania, our rural health center received funding for essential medical equipment. This has dramatically improved care quality.
story2.author: Dr. Emmanuel Mwangi

columnDescriptions.question: Question: the question text
columnDescriptions.transformation: Transformation: one of square, sqrt, inverse, or none

transformation.square: `square`: squares the value to emphasize higher scores
transformation.sqrt: `sqrt`: square root to downplay high values

about.title: About
about.p1: MediTanzania is Tanzania's leading healthcare transparency platform, providing up-to-date information on public and private healthcare facilities across the country.
about.p2: Our platform empowers citizens with reliable data and reviews to make informed decisions and fosters accountability within the healthcare system.
about.missionP1: To empower Tanzanians by increasing transparency and accessibility of healthcare information, helping them find the right care when they need it.
about.visionText: To create a healthier Tanzania through data-driven insights, community engagement, and continuous improvement in healthcare delivery.
about.taBio: Leads user interface design and frontend development to ensure an intuitive and responsive user experience.
about.jeBio: Oversees project delivery and develops robust server-side APIs and database integrations.
about.ecBio: Implements core backend services and ensures system scalability and performance.
about.emBio: Coordinates operations and contributes to backend development to streamline workflows.
